<script type="text/javascript">
//<![CDATA[
;$(function() { $('nav#mMenuCMS').mmenu({"slidingSubmenus":false,"position":"left","zposition":"back"}, {"pageNodetype":"form"});});
String.prototype.Trim = function() 
{
    return this.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,'');
}
String.prototype.LTrim = function() 
{
    return this.replace(/^\s+/,'');
}
String.prototype.RTrim = function() 
{
    return this.replace(/\s+$/,'');
}


function DisplayError(errorMessageTableRowId, errorMessageControlId, errorMessage, defaultErrorMessage)
{
    var oErrorMessageControl = document.getElementById(errorMessageControlId);
    if (oErrorMessageControl == null)
        alert('Error message control does not exist. you may need to change the ErrorDisplayTableRow from Visible=false to style=display:none');
    else
    {
        var ErrMsg = errorMessage;
        if (ErrMsg == null || ErrMsg == '')
            ErrMsg = defaultErrorMessage;
        if (ErrMsg != null && ErrMsg != '')
        {
            ErrMsg = ErrMsg.Trim();
            if (ErrMsg.charAt(ErrMsg.length - 1) != '.') 
                ErrMsg += '.';
            ErrMsg = '&nbsp;' + ('Error: ' + ErrMsg).fontcolor('Red');       // style='color: red'
        }
        if (oErrorMessageControl.nodeName == 'LABEL' || oErrorMessageControl.nodeName == 'SPAN')
            oErrorMessageControl.innerHTML = ErrMsg;
        else     
            oErrorMessageControl.value = ErrMsg;                                                    // Can't be used for displaying error message
        if (errorMessageTableRowId != null && errorMessageTableRowId != '')
        {
            var oErrorMessageTableRow = document.getElementById(errorMessageTableRowId); 
            if (oErrorMessageTableRow == null)
                alert('Error message TableRow does not exist. you may need to change the ErrorDisplayTableRow from Visible=false to style=display:none'); 
            else 
                oErrorMessageTableRow.style.display = (ErrMsg=='') ? 'none' : '';
        }    
    }
    return (ErrMsg == '');
}


function CommonFunction_DateTime_MinDateTime()
{
    return new Date(1, 0, 1);
}
function CommonFunction_DateTime_MonthNameToMonth(monthName)
{
    var MonthName = monthName.substr(0, 3).toLowerCase();
    switch (MonthName)
    {
        case 'jan' : return '01';
        case 'feb' : return '02';
        case 'mar' : return '03';
        case 'apr' : return '04';
        case 'may' : return '05';
        case 'jun' : return '06';
        case 'jul' : return '07';
        case 'aug' : return '08';
        case 'sep' : return '09';
        case 'oct' : return '10';
        case 'nov' : return '11';
        case 'dec' : return '12';
        default    : return '00'; 
    }
}
function CommonFunction_DateTime_ToDateTime(dateTimeString)
{
    dateTimeString = dateTimeString.Trim();
    if (/^\d{1,2}\/\d{1,2}\/\d{4}\s*/.test(dateTimeString))                     // Default Date format(with any Time format): '10/12/2008 02:23:45 PM GMT-4'
        return new Date(dateTimeString);                            
    else if (/^\d{4}-\d{1,2}-\d{1,2}\s*/.test(dateTimeString))                  // '2008-10-12 02:23:45 PM GMT-4'
    {
        /^(\d{4})-(\d{1,2})-(\d{1,2})\s*(.*)/.exec(dateTimeString);
        var NewDateTimeString = RegExp.$2 + '/' + RegExp.$3 + '/' + RegExp.$1 + ' ' + RegExp.$4;
//        alert(RegExp.input + ' || ' + RegExp.$1 + ' || ' + RegExp.$2 + ' || ' + RegExp.$3 + ' || ' + RegExp.$4 + ' || ' + NewDateTimeString + ' || ' + new Date(NewDateTimeString));
        return new Date(NewDateTimeString);
    }
    else if (/^\d{2}-\d{1,2}-\d{1,2}\s*/.test(dateTimeString))                  // '08-10-12 02:23:45 PM GMT-4'
        return CommonFunction_DateTime_ToDateTime('20' + dateTimeString);
    else if (/^[a-zA-Z]+\s+\d{1,2}\s*\,\s*\d{4}\s*/.test(dateTimeString))       // 'October 01, 2008 22:33:44'
    {
        /^([a-zA-Z]+)\s+(\d{1,2})\s*\,\s*(\d{4})\s*(.*)/.exec(dateTimeString);
        var NewDateTimeString = CommonFunction_DateTime_MonthNameToMonth(RegExp.$1) + '/' + RegExp.$2 + '/' + RegExp.$3 + ' ' + RegExp.$4;
//        alert(RegExp.input + ' || ' + RegExp.$1 + ' || ' + RegExp.$2 + ' || ' + RegExp.$3 + ' || ' + RegExp.$4 + ' || ' + NewDateTimeString + ' || ' + new Date(NewDateTimeString));
        return new Date(NewDateTimeString);
    }
    else return CommonFunction_DateTime_MinDateTime();
}


function AppendHtmlToParent(childControl, HtmlString)
{
    var Id = childControl.id;
    childControl = document.getElementById(Id);
    childControl.parentNode.innerHTML += HtmlString;
    childControl = document.getElementById(Id);
    return childControl;
}
function RemoveHtmlFromParent(childControl, HtmlStringPattern, HtmlString)
{
    if (HtmlString != null)
    {
        childControl = AppendHtmlToParent(childControl, HtmlString);
        var MatchString = childControl.parentNode.innerHTML.match(HtmlStringPattern);
        if (MatchString != null)
            alert(MatchString);
        else    
            alert('Error! HtmlStringPattern can not match the HtmlString when it is added to innerHTML.');
    }
    var Id = childControl.id;
    var InputValue = childControl.value;
    childControl.parentNode.innerHTML = childControl.parentNode.innerHTML.replace(HtmlStringPattern, '');
    childControl = document.getElementById(Id);            
    childControl.value = InputValue;
    return childControl;
}


function ControlCollectionToArray(ControlArray1, ControlArray2)
{
    var ControlCount = 0;
    for (var i=0; i<arguments.length; i++)
        ControlCount += arguments[i].length;
    var ControlArray = new Array(ControlCount);
    ControlCount = 0;
    for (var i=0; i<arguments.length; i++)
    {
        var ControlCollection = arguments[i];
        for (var j=0; j<ControlCollection.length; j++)
            ControlArray[ControlCount++] = ControlCollection[j];
    }
//    for (var i=0; i<ControlArray.length; i++)
//        alert(i + '-[' + ControlArray[i] + '|' + ControlArray[i].value + ']');
    return ControlArray;
}

<script type="text/javascript">
//<![CDATA[

function InputConstraint_OnLoad(textBoxControlId, oRegExp)            
{
    oTextBoxControl = document.getElementById(textBoxControlId);
	if (oTextBoxControl)
	{
		if (oRegExp.test(oTextBoxControl.value))
			oTextBoxControl.OldValue = oTextBoxControl.value;
		else 
			oTextBoxControl.value = oTextBoxControl.OldValue = '';
	}
}
function InputConstraint_OnChange(oTextBoxControl, oRegExp)         
{
    if (oRegExp.test(oTextBoxControl.value))
        oTextBoxControl.OldValue = oTextBoxControl.value;
    else {
        if (typeof(oTextBoxControl.OldValue) == 'undefined' || oTextBoxControl.value == '') 
            oTextBoxControl.OldValue = '';
        oTextBoxControl.value = oTextBoxControl.OldValue;
    } 
}

function isChildOf(parentId,element) {
    while(element) {
       if(element.id&&element.id.indexOf(parentId)> -1) {
          return true; 

       } 
       element=element.parentNode; 
   } 

   return false;
}
function onRowDroppingctl00_ContentPlaceHolder1_ctl06_grdPendingImageOrders(sender,args) {
   if(sender.get_id()== 'ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder1_ctl06_grdPendingImageOrders') {
      var node=args.get_destinationHtmlElement();
      if(!isChildOf('ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder1_ctl06_grdPendingImageOrders',node)) {
         args.set_cancel(true);
      }
   }
} 

//]]>
</script>

<script type='text/javascript'>
            function OnClientCommandExecuted(editor,commandName,tool)
            {
                if(commandName=='ToggleScreenMode' || commandName._commandName == 'ToggleScreenMode' )
                {
            
TogglePageControlsBar();
}
            }

            function TogglePageControlsBar( menuIDList )
            {
                if(typeof menuIDList != 'undefined' || menuIDList != null)
                {
                    var menuList = menuIDList.split(',');
                    for( var i=0; i<menuList.length; i++ )
                    {
                        var el = document.getElementByID(menuList[i]);

                        if( el != undefined )
                        {
                            if( el.style.visibility!='hidden' )
                                el.style.visibility ='hidden';
                            else 
                                el.style.visibility = 'visible';
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
</script>

		<td height="100%" width="100%"><div class="ptl_top_portlet" style="display:none;"></div><div id="ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder1_ctl24_divContent"><p align="center" style="text-align: center;"><img title="Renewing the Promise, the future of catholic education, an evening with bishop crosby" style="width: 500px; height: 213px; vertical-align: top;" alt="Renewing the Promise, the future of catholic education, an evening with bishop crosby" src="http://p1cdn4static.sharpschool.com/UserFiles/Servers/Server_5912063/Image/News%20Pictures/2017%202018/header.jpg"></p>
<p><span style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 12pt;">The Bruce-Grey Catholic District School Board is hosting its <strong>3<sup>rd</sup> annual Bishop&rsquo;s Dinner</strong> with Bishop Douglas Crosby.&nbsp; <em>Renewing the Promise &ndash; The Future of Catholic Education</em> is scheduled for <strong>Thursday, April 5th</strong> at the Neustadt Community Hall. &nbsp;</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 12pt;">The evening will feature students sharing stories of how they have used innovation and design thinking to approach real world problems in the local and global community. Join us for a celebration of student talent and a glimpse into some of the ways our youth are becoming creative and holistic thinkers, responsible citizens, lifelong learners &amp; discerning believers.</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 12pt;">Guests will enjoy a full course dinner catered by Chef Alex Petter, entertainment, silent and live auctions, and student displays and presentations. All funds raised will support new Canadians in Bruce and Grey counties.</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: Arial;"><strong><span>Tickets are $40.00 each, and can be purchased <a title="link to online ticket sales and donations" href="https://www.canadahelps.org/en/charities/bruce-grey-catholic-district-school-board-charitable-trust/events/bishops-dinner-april-5-2018/">online</a></span></strong>,<br>
through the school, or by calling 519-364-5820 x268.<br>
<br>
<img title="link to online ticket sales" style="float: right;" alt="link to online ticket sales" src="http://p1cdn4static.sharpschool.com/UserFiles/Servers/Server_5912063/Image/News%20Pictures/2016%202017/get%20tickets%20button.jpg" border="0" usemap="#rade_img_map_1518036112076"></span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: Arial;"><strong><span>Cash donations also accepted online for those unable to attend the event.</span></strong> <br>
<br>
(Tax receipts will be issued for the full amount of all cash donations, and for $18.00 for each ticket purchased)</span></p>
<p><span style="background: white; color: rgb(29, 33, 41); font-family: Arial; font-size: 12pt;">To donate to the auctions, or for more information, please contact Doreen Schultz at the Catholic Education Centre, 519-364-5820 X268.</span></p>
<p><span style="letter-spacing: 0.25pt; font-family: Arial;">We hope you will mark April 5 on your calendar and plan to attend this very worthwhile event</span><span style="font-family: Arial;">.<span style="letter-spacing: -0.05pt;"> </span>With your support we can ensure that this evening is a huge success, in support of those who have sought the safety and comfort of our communities. &nbsp;</span></p>
<p align="center" style="text-align: center;"><strong><em><span>&ldquo;Let your light shine before others, that they see your good works&rdquo; </span></em></strong><span style="font-size: 9pt;">(Mt 5:16).</span></p>
<h1> <hr>
<br>
<span style="color: rgb(0, 32, 96); font-family: Arial;">March's Virtue is Compassion<img title="compassion wordle" style="width: 150px; height: 150px; float: right;" alt="compassion wordle" src="http://p1cdn4static.sharpschool.com/UserFiles/Servers/Server_5912063/Image/Doreen/Virtues%20images/compassion2.png"></span></h1>
<span style="letter-spacing: -0.15pt; font-family: Arial; font-size: 13.5pt;">
</span>
<p class="Normal1"><span style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px;">Compassion is following the example of Jesus the healer, who acted with deep care and concern for the people who were hurt or troubled.  When we are compassionate we reach out in love to assist those who need our help. <br>
<br>
</span><strong><em><span style="margin: 0px; color: rgb(255, 0, 128);">As God&rsquo;s chosen ones, holy and beloved, clothe yourselves with </span></em></strong><strong><em><span style="margin: 0px; color: rgb(255, 0, 128);">compassion, kindness, humility, meekness and patience.</span></em></strong><span style="color: rgb(0, 32, 96); font-family: Arial; font-size: 10px;"> &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;<br>
1 Colossians 3.12</span></p>
<span style="color: rgb(13, 13, 13); letter-spacing: -0.15pt; font-family: Arial,sans-serif; font-size: 13.5pt;"></span>
<p class="Normal1"><span style="color: rgb(0, 51, 153); font-family: Arial;;color: rgb(0, 0, 0);"><em><strong>Dear God,</strong></em></span><em><strong><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial;"><br>
</span></strong></em></p>
<p align="center" style="margin: 0px; text-align: left;"><em><strong><span style="margin: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px;">During this Lenten season, </span><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);;margin: 0px; font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px;">I pray in a special way</span></strong></em></p>
<p align="center" style="margin: 0px; text-align: left;"><em><strong><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);;margin: 0px; font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px;">For all people who need the healing and compassion of Your Son, Jesus.</span></strong></em></p>
<p align="center" style="margin: 0px; text-align: left;"><em><strong><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);;margin: 0px; font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px;">Help me to be His hands, His eyes, His ears, and His heart to them.</span></strong></em></p>
<p align="center" style="margin: 0px; text-align: left;"><em><strong><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);;margin: 0px; font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px;">Inspire me always to do for others what I would want them to do for me.</span></strong></em></p>
<p align="center" style="margin: 0px; text-align: left;"><em><strong><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);;margin: 0px; font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px;">Guide me to learn about the needs of our world.</span></strong></em></p>
<p align="center" style="margin: 0px; text-align: left;"><em><strong><span style="margin: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px;">May Jesus&rsquo; Spirit shine through me in my service to the poor and needy.</span><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial;"><br>
</span></strong></em></p>
<p class="Normal1"><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial;"><em><strong>
Amen.&nbsp;&nbsp;</strong></em></span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><span style="font-family: Arial;"></span></p>
<hr>
<h3 align="center" style="text-align: center;"><span style="color: rgb(31, 73, 125); font-family: Arial;">Public Consultation:</span></h3>
<h3 align="center" style="text-align: center;"><span style="color: rgb(31, 73, 125); font-family: Arial;">A new vision for student transportation</span></h3>
<p><span style="font-family: Arial;">The Ministry of Education is interested in knowing how student transportation services can be improved to better serve students, families and communities.&nbsp;</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: Arial;">Your feedback is very important in providing an understanding of what&rsquo;s important to you when it comes to student transportation.&nbsp; Your feedback will help to provide guidance for future policy development such as funding and accountability. </span></p>
<p><span style="color: rgb(77, 77, 77); font-family: Arial;">To help prompt feedback, the following are some of the&nbsp;questions:</span></p>
<ul style="list-style-type: square;">
    <li><span style="color: rgb(77, 77, 77); font-family: Arial;">How can we work together with our student transportation partners (such as, school boards, transportation consortia, school bus operators) to make our system more responsive to the needs of students and&nbsp;parents?</span></li>
    <li><span style="color: rgb(77, 77, 77); font-family: Arial;">Does Ontario&rsquo;s student transportation system take into account the diverse needs of different groups of&nbsp;students?</span></li>
    <li><span style="color: rgb(77, 77, 77); font-family: Arial;">How can we enhance safety and well-being for students using transportation&nbsp;services?</span></li>
    <li><span style="color: rgb(77, 77, 77); font-family: Arial;">What sort of innovations and partnerships could improve the efficiency and affordability of student&nbsp;transportation?</span></li>
    <li><span style="color: rgb(77, 77, 77); font-family: Arial;">What can be done to support the recruitment and retention of well-trained school bus&nbsp;drivers?</span></li>
</ul>
<p><span style="font-family: Arial;">A report on the results of this consultation will be provided in fall 2018.</span></p>
<p align="center" style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: Arial;"><strong><span style="background: yellow; font-size: 11pt;">Closing date: March 29, 2018</span></strong></span></p>
<p><span style="color: rgb(77, 77, 77); font-family: Arial;">To view the full provincial discussion paper please select the following link: </span></p>
<p align="center" style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: Arial;"><a href="https://www.ontario.ca/page/discussion-paper-new-vision-student-transportation">https://www.ontario.ca/page/discussion-paper-new-vision-student-transportation</a></span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: Arial;"><strong><span style="color: rgb(77, 77, 77); font-size: 11pt;">Please send your responses by&nbsp;email to:</span></strong></span></p>
<p align="center" style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: Arial;"><a href="mailto:ST.newvision@ontario.ca"><strong><span style="color: rgb(129, 56, 179); font-size: 11pt;">ST.newvision@ontario.ca</span></strong></a></span></p>
<p align="center" style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: Arial;"><strong><span style="color: rgb(77, 77, 77);">Please include: Student Transportation Consultation&nbsp;</span></strong><span style="color: rgb(77, 77, 77);">in the subject line of your&nbsp;email</span></span></p>
<p><span style="color: rgb(77, 77, 77); font-family: Arial;">If applicable, which group you represent (for example, a parent, a school board, transportation operator or student transportation&nbsp;group)</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: Arial;"><strong><span style="color: rgb(77, 77, 77);">Please do not include attachments larger than 25&nbsp;MB.</span></strong></span></p>
<p><span style="color: rgb(77, 77, 77); font-family: Arial;">The Ministry of Education will read and consider every submission.</span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<hr>

/* START add classes to menu items depending on window location - url */
$(document).ready(function(){
    var full_path = location.href.split("#")[0];
    $(".megamenu a.parent").each(function(){
        var $this = $(this);
        if($this.prop("href").split("#")[0] == full_path) {
            $this.addClass("active");
        }
    });
});


/* START unknown */
$(document).ready(function() {
	var megamenuddl;
	$(".megamenu li.m_item.level0").hover(function(){
			clearTimeout(megamenuddl);
			megamenuddl = null;
			$(this).siblings().find(".m_ddpanel").hide();
			$(this).find(".m_ddpanel").slideDown(400);
		}, function() {
			var thisMegaMenu = $(this);
			megamenuddl = setTimeout(function(){ thisMegaMenu.find(".m_ddpanel").slideUp(400); }, 300)
	});
	
	var currURL = location.pathname.toLowerCase();
	
	if (currURL.indexOf("one.aspx") > 0) {
		currURL = currURL + "?portalid=" + getUrlVars()["portalid"] + "&pageid=" + getUrlVars()["pageid"];
	}	
	
	$(".megamenu a.m_link[href='" + currURL + "']").parentsUntil(".megamenu", ".m_item").children(".m_link").addClass("current");	
});

function getUrlVars() {
    var vars = {};
    var parts = window.location.href.toLowerCase().replace(/[?&]+([^=&]+)=([^&]*)/gi,    
    function(m,key,value) {
      vars[key] = value;
    });
    return vars;
}
